What is Saranthium?
Saranthium is a 317 Economy server based on RuneScape 2009. We strive for a perfect gaming experience. We are 24/7 hosted on a DDoS protected VPS.

  • Features -
    All skills working
    Active community
    Stable / No Lag
    Quests
    Good Slayer
